parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The programming language of the application.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region to which the application belongs.

parameters.name: SentinelEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to start the switch.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The service where the application is deployed. A value of ACK indicates Container Service for Kubernetes.

parameters.name: SwitchEnable
parameters.description: The name of the Microservices Engine (MSE) namespace.
